[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@nextgis/ngw-map](./ngw-map.md) &gt; [NgwMapOptions](./ngw-map.ngwmapoptions.md) &gt; [controlsOptions](./ngw-map.ngwmapoptions.controlsoptions.md)

## NgwMapOptions.controlsOptions property

Set options for those controls that are specified by name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
controlsOptions?: ControlsOptions;
```

## Example


```javascript
{
  controls: ['ZOOM', 'button1', 'button2'],
  controlsOptions: {
    'ZOOM': { position: 'top-right' },
    'button1': { control: 'BUTTON', position: 'top-left' },
    'button2': { control: 'BUTTON' },
  }
}

```
